data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lu, Lin, Webb, M. D., Zhang, Yalin (2018): A new leafhopper genus of subtribe Paraboloponina (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae: Drabescini), with description of two new species from Papua New Guinea. Zootaxa 4521 (2): 281-286, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4521.2.9|5 occurrences
